alert.note: Alert for Louisa; Muscatine (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 12:50PM CDT until further notice by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Quad Cities IA IL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Illinois...Iowa... Mississippi River at Muscatine affecting Muscatine, Louisa, Mercer and Rock Island Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is expected in the next 7 days * WHERE...Mississippi River at Muscatine. * WHEN...From Thursday evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM CDT Monday the stage was 14.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday evening and continue rising to 18.5 feet Monday morning. Rises are expected to continue until at least the end of April. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
